info.title: Challenge
texts: The task was to design the architecture and interiors of eco-villas that embody  the philosophy of sustainable living while offering modern comfort.
The goal was not only to create functional homes but also to provide an inspiring environment that ensures energy independence, minimal maintenance, and a strong emotional connection with nature.
